title: Bug 4971: Strange 'Copy Package'
description: When performing a 'copy package' operation, the behavior appears to be strange. The bug occurs in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui package of the jdt.ui3 project. To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
OB: The observed behavior is not provided in the bug report.
EB: The expected behavior is not provided in the bug report.
SR:
1. Create a new project called 'xxx'.
2. Navigate to the Package viewer in project A.
3. Select a package in the viewer.
4. From the context menu, choose 'Copy'.
